data: The day was ideal for me, an idler who had left the train at the station not far from this particular hamlet, more because it looked attractive, than from actual intention.
Idealia, a Utopian Dream; or, Resthaven
H. Alfarata Chapman (Harriet Alfarata Chapman) Thompson
Thompson, H. Alfarata Chapman (Harriet Alfarata Chapman), 1871-1922; Dewey, Melvil, 1851-1931 [Author of introduction, etc.]; Thompson, J. W. (John Wallace), 1844-1940 [Author of introduction, etc.]
